title: Claude Code API Request Logs
description: Explore Claude Code API requests and responses captured by the proxy

request_logs.title: API Request Logs
request_logs.description: All Anthropic API requests and responses

v_flatten_request_headers.title: Request Headers (Flattened)
v_flatten_request_headers.description: All request headers as individual rows with faceting support

v_flatten_response_headers.title: Response Headers (Flattened)
v_flatten_response_headers.description: All response headers as individual rows with faceting support

v_flatten_request_body.title: Request Body (Flattened)
v_flatten_request_body.description: All request body fields as individual rows with faceting support

v_full_request_data.title: Full Request Data (Flattened)
v_full_request_data.description: Combined headers and body with faceting support

api-overview.title: API Request Overview
api-overview.description: Overview dashboard for Claude API proxy logs

total-requests.title: Total Requests
total-requests.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM request_logs WHERE timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]]

success-rate.title: Success Rate
success-rate.query: SELECT ROUND(CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN response_status < 400 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(*) * 100, 2) as value FROM request_logs WHERE timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]]

avg-response-time.title: Avg Response Time
avg-response-time.query: SELECT ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) as value FROM request_logs WHERE timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]]

requests-by-user-agent.title: Requests by User Agent
requests-by-user-agent.query: SELECT json_extract(request_headers, '$.User-Agent') as user_agent, COUNT(*) as count FROM request_logs WHERE json_extract(request_headers, '$.User-Agent') IS NOT NULL AND timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]] GROUP BY json_extract(request_headers, '$.User-Agent') ORDER BY count DESC

requests-by-model.title: Requests by Model
requests-by-model.query: SELECT json_extract(request_body, '$.model') as model, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(json_extract(response_body, '$.usage.input_tokens')) as input_tokens, SUM(json_extract(response_body, '$.usage.output_tokens')) as output_tokens, SUM(json_extract(response_body, '$.usage.cache_read_input_tokens')) as cache_read_tokens FROM request_logs WHERE response_status = 200 AND timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]] GROUP BY 1 HAVING model IS NOT NULL AND model != '' ORDER BY 2 DESC

total-input-tokens.title: Total Input Tokens
total-input-tokens.query: SELECT SUM(json_extract(response_body, '$.usage.input_tokens')) as value FROM request_logs WHERE response_status = 200 AND timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]]

total-cache-creation-tokens.title: Total Cache Creation Tokens
total-cache-creation-tokens.query: SELECT SUM(json_extract(response_body, '$.usage.cache_creation_input_tokens')) as value FROM request_logs WHERE response_status = 200 AND timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]]

total-cache-read-tokens.title: Total Cache Read Tokens
total-cache-read-tokens.query: SELECT SUM(json_extract(response_body, '$.usage.cache_read_input_tokens')) as value FROM request_logs WHERE response_status = 200 AND timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]]

total-output-tokens.title: Total Output Tokens
total-output-tokens.query: SELECT SUM(json_extract(response_body, '$.usage.output_tokens')) as value FROM request_logs WHERE response_status = 200 AND timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]]

requests-timeline.title: Requests Timeline
requests-timeline.query: SELECT date(timestamp) as time, COUNT(*) as count FROM request_logs WHERE timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]] GROUP BY date(timestamp) ORDER BY time

recent-requests.title: Recent API Requests
recent-requests.query: SELECT timestamp, method, path, response_status, ROUND(duration_ms, 2) as duration_ms FROM request_logs WHERE timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]] ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20

requests-by-status.title: Requests by Status Code
requests-by-status.query: SELECT response_status, json_extract(response_headers, '$.Content-Type') as content_type, COUNT(*) as count, ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) as avg_duration_ms FROM request_logs WHERE timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]] GROUP BY response_status, json_extract(response_headers, '$.Content-Type') ORDER BY count DESC

requests-by-path.title: Requests by Path
requests-by-path.query: SELECT path, COUNT(*) as count, ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) as avg_duration_ms FROM request_logs WHERE timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]] GROUP BY path ORDER BY count DESC

slowest-requests.title: Slowest Requests
slowest-requests.query: SELECT timestamp, method, path, response_status, ROUND(duration_ms, 2) as duration_ms FROM request_logs WHERE timestamp >= COALESCE(NULLIF(:date_start, ''), date('now', '-7 days')) [[ AND timestamp < date(:date_end, '+1 day') ]] ORDER BY duration_ms DESC LIMIT 10

unique-request-headers.title: Unique Request Headers
unique-request-headers.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT header_name) as value FROM v_flatten_request_headers

unique-response-headers.title: Unique Response Headers
unique-response-headers.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT header_name) as value FROM v_flatten_response_headers

common-request-headers.title: Most Common Request Headers
common-request-headers.query: SELECT header_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM v_flatten_request_headers GROUP BY header_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 15

common-response-headers.title: Most Common Response Headers
common-response-headers.query: SELECT header_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM v_flatten_response_headers GROUP BY header_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 15

user-agents.title: User Agents
user-agents.query: SELECT user_agent, COUNT(*) as count FROM (SELECT json_extract(value, '$') as user_agent FROM request_logs, json_each(request_headers) WHERE key = 'User-Agent') GROUP BY user_agent ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10

total-errors.title: Total Errors
total-errors.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM request_logs WHERE response_status >= 400

error-rate.title: Error Rate
error-rate.query: SELECT ROUND(CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN response_status >= 400 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(*) * 100, 2) as value FROM request_logs

4xx-errors.title: 4xx Errors
4xx-errors.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM request_logs WHERE response_status >= 400 AND response_status < 500

5xx-errors.title: 5xx Errors
5xx-errors.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM request_logs WHERE response_status >= 500

recent-errors.title: Recent Errors
recent-errors.query: SELECT timestamp, method, path, response_status, ROUND(duration_ms, 2) as duration_ms FROM request_logs WHERE response_status >= 400 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20

error-distribution.title: Error Distribution
error-distribution.query: SELECT response_status, path, COUNT(*) as count FROM request_logs WHERE response_status >= 400 GROUP BY response_status, path ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 15

performance.title: Performance Metrics
performance.description: Analyze API performance and response times

min-response-time.title: Min Response Time
min-response-time.query: SELECT ROUND(MIN(duration_ms), 2) as value FROM request_logs

max-response-time.title: Max Response Time
max-response-time.query: SELECT ROUND(MAX(duration_ms), 2) as value FROM request_logs

median-response-time.title: Median Response Time
median-response-time.query: SELECT ROUND((SELECT duration_ms FROM request_logs ORDER BY duration_ms LIMIT 1 OFFSET (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM request_logs) / 2), 2) as value

performance-by-endpoint.title: Performance by Endpoint
performance-by-endpoint.query: SELECT path, COUNT(*) as requests, ROUND(MIN(duration_ms), 2) as min_ms, ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) as avg_ms, ROUND(MAX(duration_ms), 2) as max_ms FROM request_logs GROUP BY path ORDER BY avg_ms DESC

fast-requests.title: Fast Requests (< 100ms)
fast-requests.query: SELECT path, COUNT(*) as count, ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) as avg_ms FROM request_logs WHERE duration_ms < 100 GROUP BY path ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10

slow-requests.title: Slow Requests (> 1000ms)
slow-requests.query: SELECT path, COUNT(*) as count, ROUND(AVG(duration_ms), 2) as avg_ms FROM request_logs WHERE duration_ms > 1000 GROUP BY path ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
